EmailTemplate.name: 2018.10.15 - GR - Redemption Offer V2.2018.10.15 - GR - Redemption Offer V2
EmailTemplate.subject: Get $10 OFF With Your Points
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> FREE Shipping* <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/ EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
<[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/ EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 5 Days Only <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/%20EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Redeem To Get $10 OFF Your Next Purchase
Help your business save even more by using your points. Redeem a minimum of 10 points in the next 5 days and we will send you an exclusive promo code!
1 POINT = $1
Take advantage on or before October 19th, 2018 at 24:00 EDT. Redeem Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Furniture Breakroom Technology Don’t forget, using your points gets you extraordinary rewards! Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Offer expires October 19th, 2018. Redeem minimum of 10 points is required. Promo code will be issued within fifteen (15) days after the offer period has ended. Please allow up to 30 days for any bonus points to be added to your account. To check your current Grand Rewards points balance, please sign in to your account.
